house_listing.house_description: Show case home of the 1990's. Wonderful interior architecture reflects modern yet refined taste. 2 story open lr, dr, family room & foyer. Exterior reflects 'european villa. J.F.Schoch award winning custom builder. Your plans or ours.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Microwave, Office, TennisCourt(s)
